articles.content:

articles.title: Gaten Matarazzo Has A 'Stranger Things' Reunion On Broadway - HuffPost
articles.description: The actor made his debut performance in "Dear Evan Hansen" Tuesday before an audience that included his Netflix co-stars Maya Hawke and Sadie Sink.
